title: Noah: Democratic Party is like a club on Tuesday night; anyone can get in
text:
CLOSE A look at the most recent Democratic debate in Best of Late Night. Vote for your favorite joke at usatoday.com/opinion. Eileen Rivers, USA TODAY Opinion

A look at the most recent debate in Best of Late Night

So how did 12 candidates end up on stage during Tuesday night's Democratic debate?

Listen to the late-night comics and you'll be convinced it's because the party is too nice. As Trevor Noah says, they're like a club on a slow weeknight — even the weird guys wearing sandals can get in. But he has an interesting solution for stopping the field from multiplying. Find out what that is in today's Best of Late Night, above.

What's even weirder? Jimmy Kimmel compared Tuesday night's lineup to the menu at the Cheesecake Factory. There's just too much to choose from. What sandwich is Sen. Bernie Sanders? And what twin-sized meal fits the personality of Julian Castro? Take a look at today's webisode.

Best variety talk series: "The Daily Show" with Trevor Noah, Comedy Central (Photo: Jeff Schear, Getty Images for Comedy Central)

After you watch our favorite jokes from last night's late-night lineup, vote for yours in the poll below.

Follow Eileen Rivers on Twitter @msdc14.
